name: Kristo Numpuby
description:
'''Kristo Numpuby''' is a guitarist, bassist and singer born in Paris but raised in [[Es√©ka]], South [[Cameroon]].

Author and composer, Kristo sings mainly in [[Basaa language|Bassa]] and French on [[Assiko]] music the traditional rhythm of the southern Cameroon forests, using a guitar, knives, forks and spoons, and empty bottles for the percussion. He is also inspired by other Cameroonian music styles ([[Makossa]], [[Bikutsi]]) and Jazz.
